Black Tank Heavy Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Black Tank Heavy Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Black Tank Armour Set: 
 
 1. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 2. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Boots 
 3. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 4. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 5. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure lourde Black Tank, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Black Tank complet : 
 
 1. Black Tank - Gilet de combat lourd 
 2. Black Tank - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 3. Black Tank - Gants de combat lourds 
 4. Black Tank - Casque de combat lourd 
 5. Black Tank - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Black Tank; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Black Tank-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Black Tank - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 2. Black Tank - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 3. Black Tank - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 4. Black Tank - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 5. Black Tank - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura pesante Black Tank, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Black Tank: 
 
 1. Black Tank - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 2. Black Tank - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 3. Black Tank - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 4. Black Tank - casco da combattimento pesante 
 5. Black Tank - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura pesada Black Tank, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Black Tank - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 2. Black Tank - Botas de combate pesadas 
 3. Black Tank - Guantes de combate pesados 
 4. Black Tank - Casco de combate pesado 
 5. Black Tank - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 검은 탱크 방어구 세트입니다. 검은 탱크 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투부츠 (남성)
 3. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투장갑 (남성)
 4. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투헬멧 (남성)
 5. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

The complete Black Tank Heavy Armor Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Black Tank Armor Set:
 
 1. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Men)
 2. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Boots (Men)
 3. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Gloves (Men)
 4. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Helmet (Men)
 5. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]

 2. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥靴子(男用) 
 3. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥手套(男用) 
 4. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(男用) 
 5. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥護脛(男用) [#Legal]
